reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The Area Development Programme of Ngoswet is situated in the Eastern Part of Kenya, about 400 km from Nairobi. The population of the programme area is approximately 26000 people. During the year 2016 the goal is to conduct an in depth baseline survey, to i ncrease the knowledge and understanding of the context; the reasons of poverty and the local stakeholders, as well as to identify possibilities and weaknesses and the capacity's and resources of local partners. The main goals of the programme will be final ized as part of this process. The main partner is World Vision Kenya, who is responsible for the implementation of the programme. Other key partners are relevant sectorial ministers, local government officials and religious groups.
